paper_abstract: Recently, Yu, Gong and Tang found new constructions of binary sequences of period 4N with optimal autocorrelation magnitude by different interleaved structure of sequences and sequences which had special correlation property, respectively. In this paper, we derive more results on binary sequences of period 4N which also have optimal autocorrelation.
paper_title: New Constructions of Binary Sequences with Optimal Autocorrelation Magnitude Based on Interleaving Technique
